mapper.select: select c.idx,c.tot_pri,a.fname as appe,s.fname as soup,m.fname as main,si.fname as side,de.fname as des, dr.fname as drink from course c INNER JOIN food a on c.appe=a.idx INNER JOIN food s on c.soup=s.idx INNER JOIN food m on c.main=m.idx INNER JOIN food si on c.side=si.idx INNER JOIN food de on c.des=de.idx INNER JOIN food dr on c.drink=dr.idx where c.idx=#{idx}
